price: 20. Y si miraras (en el Paraíso), solo verías delicias y un gran reino.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿīman wamul'kan kabīran
